data.text: @JoannaInNY @DawnCorleone Those who incorrectly fantasize that Will & Kate aren’t like Harry & Meghan because of their status, ignoring that Charles & Camilla are & have a higher status, are denigrating W&K by pretending they are different to justify liking them instead of accepting them as they are.

@JoannaInNY @DawnCorleone The truth doesn’t denigrate you unless it reveals what you seek to mask. If you accept responsibility for the reality you create with your choices, you are not denigrated but free. William & Kate are free to do as Meghan & Harry do, contrary to what you said, but choose not to. https://t.co/GYG0Ab5PE3

@RoyallyPetite @DawnCorleone I understand all of your points. But I don't like to denigrate any of these people. They are all different and I like all of them.I guess your feelings are stronger. I feel that none of them are bad people, especially compared to other public figures at the moment!

@JoannaInNY @DawnCorleone Camilla dances with reporters, Charles eats and drinks beer with gusto with the public & they, not Will & Kate, are the future King & Queen of 🇬🇧 So, W&K’s position is not an excuse for their lack of spontaneity, they simply lack or don’t want to be spontaneous with the public.

@JoannaInNY @DawnCorleone The body language/jokes, there is nothing Meghan & Harry do that William & Kate couldn’t, William & Kate choose to be more distant & are less willing to engage genuinely w/others, they don’t have the constraints people assign to them, they simply aren’t as warm as Harry & Meghan.

@RoyallyPetite @DawnCorleone Not talking about work at all, not comparing the two in that way. I'm talking about joking around, body language, "casual" couple-next-door vibe stuff.  Never voiced any opinion about work ethics!!

@JoannaInNY @DawnCorleone Meghan & Harry aren’t more casual than Will f Kate can be, they are more interested in working to make the world around them better than about hiding in privilege because they will be working later in life. They don’t mind working hard now & understand it is part of life as well.

@JoannaInNY @DawnCorleone William and Kate have the top jobs waiting for them but they are not preparing for them at all, what use is this leisure time royalists are excusing them for having because they will get the top job, if they don’t use it as preparation for it?

@JoannaInNY @DawnCorleone H&M have done nothing Kate and William cannot do & Harry has done very little in terms of public duties that William couldn’t have done, he founded 2 charitable causes, Charles & Philip as well, his status is not an excuse for William to do so little or be so sheltered.

@DawnCorleone @RoyallyPetite Yes, I'm afraid people will compare W&K with H&M and think the former are cold fish, but H&M have the luxury of acting more casual.  W&K have the "top jobs" awaiting them. #MeghanAndHarry

@RoyallyPetite I rewatched the engagement interview. Goodness me, we’ve come a long way from “whatever in love means” and even William’s slightly mumbly, matter-of-fact delivery. Harry talked like he was chatting in a pub with friends. He’s good people.
